title: Choose Your Fitness Plan
subtitle: Start free and upgrade when you're ready to unlock advanced features

free.name: Free
free.description: Perfect for trying out LiftFire and basic workout tracking.

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: For serious fitness enthusiasts who want advanced features and cloud sync.

elite.name: Elite
elite.description: For fitness professionals and serious athletes who need the ultimate tools.

whatIncluded.question: What's included in the free plan?
whatIncluded.answer: The free plan includes access to our complete exercise database, offline workout tracking, basic gamification features, and local data storage. It's perfect for getting started with LiftFire.

upgradeAnytime.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade anytime?
upgradeAnytime.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and you'll be charged or credited proportionally.

dataSync.question: How does cloud sync work?
dataSync.answer: With Pro and Elite plans, your workout data automatically syncs across all your devices. You can start a workout on your phone and finish it on your tablet seamlessly.

studentDiscount.question: Do you offer student discounts?
studentDiscount.answer: Yes! Students get 50% off Pro and Elite plans. Contact us at support@liftfire.app with your student ID for verification.

cancelAnytime.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancelAnytime.answer: Absolutely. You can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access to premium features until the end of your billing period.

offlineWork.question: Does LiftFire work offline?
offlineWork.answer: Yes! LiftFire works 100% offline on all plans. Your workouts are saved locally and sync automatically when you're back online.

guarantee.title: 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee
guarantee.description: Try LiftFire risk-free. If you're not completely satisfied, we'll refund your money within 30 days.

contact.title: Need Help Choosing?
contact.description: Our team is here to help you find the perfect plan for your fitness goals.

upgrade.title: Ready to Supercharge Your Workouts?
upgrade.description: Join thousands of fitness enthusiasts who have transformed their training with LiftFire's advanced features. Start with our free plan or jump straight to Pro for the full experience.

finalCta.title: Start Your Fitness Transformation Today
finalCta.description: Don't wait to achieve your fitness goals. Join the LiftFire community and experience the future of workout tracking.

comparison.title: Compare All Features
comparison.subtitle: See exactly what's included in each plan with our detailed feature comparison
